claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

verified_evidence.quote: Enrolled and Randomized n=723 vaccine Allocation Flu zone IIV4 n=122 18-44 years: n=57 45-64 years: n=65 Completed day 0 (n=110) 1 month (n=110) and 6 months (n=101) visit Fluarix IIV4 n=120 18-44 years: n=55 45-64 years: n=65 Completed day 0 (n=120) 1 month (n=118) and 6 months (n=107) visit re-enrolled in Year 2 and new enrollees randomized n=684 (139*) ccIIV4 in Year 1 n=214 RIV4 in Year 1 n=152
verified_evidence.explanation: The quote provides explicit evidence that Flublok (RIV4, quadrivalent recombinant influenza vaccine) and Fluarix (IIV4, quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine) were both used as comparator arms in the pivotal trial, with participant numbers and age stratification shown. This directly supports the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

rejected_evidence.quote: In this randomized trial (Clinical trials gov: NCT03722589), sera pre- and post vaccination with quadrivalent inactivated egg based (IIV4), cell culture based (ccIIV4), and recombinant (RIV4) influenza
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote explicitly states that the randomized trial evaluated quadrivalent recombinant influenza vaccine (RIV4, which is Flublok) alongside quadrivalent inactivated egg-based (IIV4) and cell culture-based (ccIIV4) vaccines, confirming that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial.

rejected_evidence.quote: Abbreviations: IIV4: Inactivated influenza vaccine (Fluzone or Fluarix® Quadrivalent; ccIIV4: Cell culture based IIV ... RIV4: recombinant hemagglutinin influenza vaccine (Flublok® Quadrivalent.
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote clarifies that Fluarix® Quadrivalent is the standard-dose comparator and Flublok® Quadrivalent is the recombinant vaccine (RIV4), confirming the identity of the vaccines compared in the trial.
